flowchart TD
    dataset[/Flickr30k Dataset
    Total Samples: 12800/]

    subgraph raw[Raw Data]
        image_raw[Raw Image]
        text_raw[Raw Caption]
    end

    subgraph img_process[Image Processing]
        resize[Resize 224x224]
        tensor[Convert to Tensor]
        normalize[Normalize RGB]
        img_batch[Image Batch]
    end

    subgraph text_process[Text Processing]
        bert[BERT Tokenizer]
        special[Add Special Tokens]
        padding[Add Padding]
        text_batch[Text Batch]
    end

    dataloader[DataLoader
    Batch Size = 128]

    train[Train Loader 
    75% - 9600 samples]
    val[Validation Loader
    25% - 3200 samples]

    dataset --> image_raw & text_raw

    image_raw --> resize --> tensor --> normalize --> img_batch
    text_raw --> bert --> special --> padding --> text_batch

    img_batch & text_batch --> dataloader
    dataloader --> train & val

    style text_process fill:#f5f9ff,stroke:#333

flowchart TD
    classDef default fill:#ffffff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef dataset fill:#f0f4ff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef processing fill:#f5f9ff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef config fill:#fff8f0,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef loaders fill:#f0fff4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px

    dataset[Flickr30k Dataset]

    subgraph raw["Raw Data Processing"]
        image_raw[Raw Image]
        text_raw[Raw Caption]
    end

    subgraph img_process["Image Pipeline"]
        resize[Resize 224x224]
        tensor[Convert to Tensor]
        normalize[Normalize RGB]
        img_batch[Image Batch]
    end

    subgraph text_process["Text Pipeline"]
        direction TB
        bert[BERT Tokenizer]
        special[Add Special Tokens]
        padding[Add Padding]
        text_batch[Text Batch]
    end

    subgraph loader_config["DataLoader Config"]
        direction TB
        shuffle[Shuffle = True]
        workers[Workers = 2]
        pin[Pin Memory = True]
        prefetch[Prefetch = 2]
    end

    subgraph loaders["DataLoaders"]
        direction TB
        train[Train Loader]
        val[Validation Loader]
    end

    dataset --> raw
    raw --> image_raw & text_raw

    image_raw --> resize --> tensor --> normalize --> img_batch
    text_raw --> bert --> special --> padding --> text_batch

    img_batch & text_batch --> train & val
    loader_config --> train & val

    linkStyle default stroke:#88888855,stroke-width:1px

graph TB
    subgraph Flickr30k Dataset
        Raw[Raw Dataset] --> Split{Train/Val Split}
        Split --> Train[Train Set: 75%]
        Split --> Val[Val Set: 25%]
    end

    subgraph Image Pipeline
        Train --> ImgT[Image Transforms]
        Val --> ImgT
        ImgT --> Resize[Resize 224x224]
        Resize --> ToTensor[Convert to Tensor]
        ToTensor --> Norm["Normalize mean=[0.485, 0.456, 0.406] std=[0.229, 0.224, 0.225]"]
    end

    subgraph Text Pipeline
        Train --> TextT[Text Processing]
        Val --> TextT
        TextT --> Token[DistilBERT Tokenizer]
        Token --> Pad[Padding to 64 tokens]
        Pad --> Mask[Attention Mask]
    end

    subgraph DataLoader Config
        Norm --> DL[DataLoader]
        Mask --> DL
        DL --> B[Batch Size: 128]
        B --> W[Workers: 2]
        W --> P[Pin Memory: True]
        P --> S[Shuffle: True]
    end

    classDef config fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    classDef process fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    class B,W,P,S config
    class ImgT,TextT,DL process
